name: UN Generosity
title: Significant UN Support
description: In 2021, Fiji received $500,000 in net official flows from UN agencies, highlighting the country's reliance on international aid for development and emergency relief.

name: HIV Challenge
title: Youth HIV Concerns
description: In 2022, there were 100 children aged 0-14 living with HIV in Fiji, indicating a need for enhanced healthcare and preventive measures.
